review: love is real

i cannot recommend this game enough it is one of the best things ive ever played its so easy to fall in love with the characters and storylines that you play through ive played for 46 hours so far and im not even close to finished this game deserves so much more love and attention

a masterpiece

this is my favorite game i have played yet as a new gamer  the story is great beautiful designs nice twists and more  i have been trying to find more games with this level of story and choice without being difficult or having a lot of combat  i will be coming back to this
this is such a fun and interesting game definitely never played anything quite like it before

i really fins this game fun the narrative and how surprisingly unforgiving it is for the other characters really brings out the feeling of being a new person in a strange land characters die choices have more depth than youd think coming into play months later

only done 1 playthrough but cant stop thinking about it writing is great especially some of the relationship stuff but i do feel that the card combat gets in the way of things sometimes   a true ng with skill and relationship retention would be perfect
the replayability and ease of play is great
great soundtrack fun card gameplay was not expecting to sit down  do a full playthrough in one sitting but was just that fun
super interesting and fun honestly it has an air of mystery and danger and sweetness i love it so far
goood game
great art interesting plot if youre like me and prefer a more storyfocused or casual game i think its definitely worth your interest
i love this game so many endings i love the characters and the story is outstanding please more of that

i love the minigame and the varied character personalities of the npcs if you like detail and to have story options a lot of them this is for you just keep in mind that more dateable characters arrive around year 5 or 6 so try to horde collectibles to gift them cause you may like them
a tale as fantastic as any of the science fiction greats and yet so wonderfully grounded in the ways that so many of us experienced growing up   wonderful writing setting and representation
very cool and fun

this is one of the best narrative games ive ever played the characters feel real they have agency they have their own lives and stories plus it captures a lot of the problems of growing up but also plenty of growth opportunities for your own main character and the cast
peak
just wrapped up my first run of this and oh my god i can already tell im going to be going for quite a few different endings in this one this game is phenomenal
nice and nuanced with a lot of approaches that look fun to explore the first play through had a lot of exciting developments and kept me on my toes
i dont know what to say i just liked it a lot

story writing and art are beatiful did not expect such depth watch out for content warnings  replayability is great but exploration outside of colony gets a bit stale i wish exploration is done a bit differently closer to jobs  make sure to install mod which shows pending events and conversations it helps massively  hard to believe this was made by only two people thank you for great experience
fun story with lots of routes and the deck building is fun and very easy to get hooked on def recommend if you love visual novels or when number go up

great art engaging story interesting scifi this is one of the best narrative games ive played the deckbuilder portion is for sure a minigame and not a primary contributor to the enjoyment strong recommendation

a wonderful game that i wish i could experience for the first time all over again great concept compelling characters nice ambient soundtrack all wrapped up in a narrative and statbuilding rpg with high replayability  if theres a spinoff or maybe a sequel for this with the same gameplay id buy it in a heartbeat
good
this game is an absolute masterpiece its a heavily decision orientated game where your actions matter and can affect you directly or indirectly and has incredible replayability 1010 highly recommend
if you like visual novels you will love this game
beautifully written and a clever concept that encourages replayability in a thoughtful and unique way really enjoyed this one
this game is absolutely amazing i cannot recommend it more truly a unique experience with unlimited playability

the best example of an emotional roller coaster ride ive ever experienced if youre hesitant about buying it try the demo after you complete the first year if you choose to buy the full game you can continue from youre last demo save
phenomenally written story and characters with deckbuilding elements that keep the game engaging i highly recommend exocolonist

the story telling is beautiful as is the imagery there is so much to figure out learn and experience i have enjoyed exploring all of the different relationships you can explore and what new information and outcomes knowing more unlocks i really enjoy the pace at which the flow of the game allows you to learn new information to inform the decisions in your next life im intrigued to keep playing until i get my perfect run

this game owned my soul for 50 hours i kept going back for more frantically trying to change outcomes and save the people i loved proenvironment antifascist gendersexuality diverse characters you will fall in love with i cant love this game more this is one of my favorite games ive ever played
this shit changed my brain very much worth the price and so so so much to do

really neat concept that falls short in some tiny ways that made it hard for me to sink too many hours into it i wish a lot of it was better than it is but i do appreciate that this game exists the characters are all really charming and i found myself very excited to learn about them as i played more same goes for the colony itself the earth we left behind and the planet we ended up on i wish most of the systems were more complicated and less repetitive than they actually are is all

it has been few years since i first played the gameand i am still finding similar games to this one love this game and wish i can time travel back to the day i first played this really recommend when you are sick of other games nothing to do andor need some relaxation  but still want to have fun and adventure
one of my favorite games of all time have purchased it twice on 2 platforms adore adore adore it highly recommend

you know when youre so attached to fictional characters or universe and when you finish the media may it be books films series or games it leaves you feeling a bit empty thats one of them its so good that it hurts when it ends

somehow this game never leaves me its always in the back of my mind i love the how it does content warnings i love the visuals i enjoyed the story its a great way to meditate on who you are and why youve become the person you are in my opinion its not the best story in the world or anything but its worth playing if youre interested its worth trying
this might be the best game i have ever played it can be very sad though so pay attention to the content warnings
i could not recommend this game enough  i find it well hard to experience personally on an emotional level but that only speaks to the quality of writing its nothing short of phenomenal

this game was an unexpected favourite of mine from last year all the characters are unique and fully fleshed out with compelling arcs if you take the time to get to know them tons of choices and branching paths but the game does start to feel very repetitive by the time youre on your third playthrough very cute art style and great music worth checking out if you like scifi rpgs and comingofage stories
fun concept i enjoyed my time with it

one of the best games ive ever played in my entire career of gaming iwate has such a lovable and relatable cast of characters with a cool romancefriend system going on this game damn near has infinite replayability and honestly one of the best soundtracks i have ever heard all and all 10010 game and tammy and nemmie are my queens screw you cal

this game has such a unique premise and i love it so much which is sad that i havent found another game that is similar it has so many different endings and ways the game can play out not to mention the simple idea of getting to take previous learned information with you in the game and not that you have to remember it from playthrough to playthrough is such an interesting concept
im not a big far of card type games but im so happy that i bought this game its amazing

my friend gifted it to me to play and i say that ive never cried in a vn as much as i did in this one for both happy and sad times  although its very heavy based on choices i think it just makes the experience all the more unique i recommend this to people who like heavy lore and notice details often that will be used later in the story  also my beloved dys

genuinely a beautiful game and worth every penny i would love to see this world characters and mechanics explored in a future game within this series i genuinely cried at the ending i didnt read any guides or spoilers like i normally would so every day in this game was something new and exciting bravo i highly recommend this game to anyone whose looking for a enriching story and cute mechanics dating sim and strategy
its a great game with lots of opportunity to replay and have different outcomes

words cannot describe how much of a joy it was playing this game the way it reveals more parts of the stories and different branching choices every run had me hooked the first run had my jaw on the floor multiple times all of the characters felt so unique and alive  the art style as a whole is out of this world the deck building aspect of it was a delightfully simple and fun incorporation amazing all around 3

id recommend it for anyone that likes to play story games enjoys rpg skill advancement likes deep character development setting expansion and isnt snowflakey enough to find gender and sexual fluidity so scary that it will melt their brains
i absolutely love this game i wish there were more on the market like this

to start with i didnt really know if i would enjoy this game as i havent played many deck building games apart from growing up took me a little way into my first playthrough to get into it and when i did woah this game as amazing characters character development choices romance and pulls on emotional heart strings throughout heaps of replayablity and so many endings friendships romances skills and outcomes highly recommend
